review: - Team Fortress 2-Review-Good sideIt's freeFunNot pay to winFree drop weaponsTons of serverTons of cool cosmetics(requires p2p)Stranges,unusual, killstreaks,decorated weapons(requires p2p)Cheap promotion to p2pCool EventsComics from Teamfortress.com to let you know how it started-Bad sideGet judged by  tons of arrogant p2p by simply wearing a hat for startersGet scammed,phished,sharked if your not wise in trading prices(not the game's fault)'Enjoy' the natural noises from squeakers and immature kids by trash talking to you in a kid friendly server.OverallGood Game Fun,Addictive,Competitive,Exciting(cuz new updates)Advice from the proIgnore the people who judges youCheck the price before tradingHave fun :D
